title: Strangers Just This Night: Sweet Erotic Romance
description: Jessica and Logan weren't supposed to know each other the night they met on a high class bar, but as soon as their eyes fell on each other, a familiar spark began to ignite. There was no stopping the attraction, and before they knew it, they were up in one of the suites of the hotel, and they were experiencing one of the best nights of their lives in each others' arms.But they have to get home to their normal lives the next morning, entering their houses with the memory of the sweet, exhausting sex that they'd shared many times the night before.Going home to their husband and wife... and to a life where they would not have to be strangers... READER ADVISORY: HOW PLEASUREFUL DO YOU LIKE YOUR STORIES? This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
